title: #277: Don't F**k With Cats with Deanna Thompson and John Green Part 2
description:
We continue our fascinating behind the scenes interview about the Emmy award winning Netflix documentary 'Don't F**k With Cats' with online sleuthers Deanna Thompson (Baudi Moovan) and John Green.


We discuss the investigation including their proactive and planned disinformation strategy to track the killer along with crush videos and the link between animal abuse, domestic violence, coercive control, human trafficking, abuse and homicide.


Animal Justice Organization

www.animalbetaproject.com

#HisNameWasJunLin
